00030 /**
00031  * Class for the TCA 'check' field
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 class tx_oop_Tca_Field_Check extends tx_oop_Tca_Field
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * The type of the field
00042      */
00043     protected $_fieldType = 'check';
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * 
00047      */
00048     protected $_itemsNum  = 0;
00049     
00050     /**
00051      * 
00052      */
00053     public function addItem( $label = '' )
00054     {
00055         if( !isset( $this->_config[ 'items' ] ) || !is_array( $this->_config[ 'items' ] ) ) {
00056             
00057             $this->_config[ 'items' ] = array();
00058         }
00059         
00060         $label = ( $label ) ? $label : $this->_name . '.I.' . $this->_itemsNum;
00061         
00062         $this->_config[ 'items' ] = array( $label, '' );
00063         
00064         $this->_itemsNum++;
00065     }
00066 }
